title: Afghanistan: the land of crags and deserts
brief_description: This film, without narration, includes various aspects of life in Afghanistan. Shows mosques, markets, women in chaderi, camel caravan watering sheep in a desert area, the game of buzkashi a form of polo which uses a headless goat, and examples of weaving and dancing.
